mn69:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
mn69:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena goliyani nama bhikkhu aranniko padasamacaro sanghamajjhe osato hoti kenacideva karaniyena.
mn69:2.2: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto goliyanim bhikkhum arabbha bhikkhu amantesi:
mn69:3.1: “Arannikenavuso, bhikkhuna sanghagatena sanghe viharantena sabrahmacarisu sagaravena bhavitabbam sappatissena.
mn69:3.2: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu sanghagato sanghe viharanto sabrahmacarisu agaravo hoti appatisso, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:3.3: ‘Kim panimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena, yo ayamayasma sabrahmacarisu agaravo hoti appatisso’ti—
mn69:3.5: Tasma arannikena bhikkhuna sanghagatena sanghe viharantena sabrahmacarisu sagaravena bhavitabbam sappatissena.
mn69:4.1: Arannikenavuso, bhikkhuna sanghagatena sanghe viharantena asanakusalena bhavitabbam:
mn69:4.2: ‘iti there ca bhikkhu nanupakhajja nisidissami nave ca bhikkhu na asanena patibahissami’ti.
mn69:4.3: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu sanghagato sanghe viharanto na asanakusalo hoti, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:4.4: ‘Kim panimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena, yo ayamayasma asanakusalo na hoti’ti—
mn69:4.6: Tasma arannikena bhikkhuna sanghagatena sanghe viharantena asanakusalena bhavitabbam.
mn69:4.7: Arannikenavuso, bhikkhuna sanghagatena sanghe viharantena abhisamacarikopi dhammo janitabbo.
mn69:4.8: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu sanghagato sanghe viharanto abhisamacarikampi dhammam na janati, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:4.9: ‘Kim panimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena yo ayamayasma abhisamacarikampi dhammam na janati’ti—
mn69:4.11: Tasma arannikena bhikkhuna sanghagatena sanghe viharantena abhisamacarikopi dhammo janitabbo.
mn69:5.1: Arannikenavuso, bhikkhuna sanghagatena sanghe viharantena natikalena gamo pavisitabbo natidiva patikkamitabbam.
mn69:5.2: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu sanghagato sanghe viharanto atikalena gamam pavisati atidiva patikkamati, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:5.3: ‘Kim panimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena yo ayamayasma atikalena gamam pavisati atidiva patikkamati’ti—
mn69:5.5: Tasma arannikena bhikkhuna sanghagatena sanghe viharantena natikalena gamo pavisitabbo, natidiva patikkamitabbam.
mn69:6.1: Arannikenavuso, bhikkhuna sanghagatena sanghe viharantena na purebhattam pacchabhattam kulesu carittam apajjitabbam.
mn69:6.2: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu sanghagato sanghe viharanto purebhattam pacchabhattam kulesu carittam apajjati, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:6.3: ‘Ayam nunimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena viharato vikalacariya bahulikata, tamenam sanghagatampi samudacarati’ti—
mn69:6.5: Tasma arannikena bhikkhuna sanghagatena sanghe viharantena na purebhattam pacchabhattam kulesu carittam apajjitabbam.
mn69:7.1: Arannikenavuso, bhikkhuna sanghagatena sanghe viharantena anuddhatena bhavitabbam acapalena.
mn69:7.2: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu sanghagato sanghe viharanto uddhato hoti capalo, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:7.3: ‘Idam nunimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena viharato uddhaccam capalyam bahulikatam, tamenam sanghagatampi samudacarati’ti—
mn69:7.5: Tasma arannikena bhikkhuna sanghagatena sanghe viharantena anuddhatena bhavitabbam acapalena.
mn69:8.1: Arannikenavuso, bhikkhuna sanghagatena sanghe viharantena amukharena bhavitabbam avikinnavacena.
mn69:8.2: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu sanghagato sanghe viharanto mukharo hoti vikinnavaco, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:8.3: ‘Kim panimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena yo ayamayasma mukharo vikinnavaco’ti—
mn69:8.5: Tasma arannikena bhikkhuna sanghagatena sanghe viharantena amukharena bhavitabbam avikinnavacena.
mn69:9.1: Arannikenavuso, bhikkhuna sanghagatena sanghe viharantena suvacena bhavitabbam kalyanamittena.
mn69:9.2: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu sanghagato sanghe viharanto dubbaco hoti papamitto, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:9.3: ‘Kim panimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena yo ayamayasma dubbaco papamitto’ti—
mn69:9.5: Tasma arannikena bhikkhuna sanghagatena sanghe viharantena suvacena bhavitabbam kalyanamittena.
mn69:10.2: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu indriyesu aguttadvaro hoti, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:10.3: ‘Kim panimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena yo ayamayasma indriyesu aguttadvaro’ti—
mn69:10.5: Tasma arannikena bhikkhuna indriyesu guttadvarena bhavitabbam.
mn69:11.2: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu bhojane amattannu hoti, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:11.3: ‘Kim panimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena yo ayamayasma bhojane amattannu’ti—
mn69:11.5: Tasma arannikena bhikkhuna bhojane mattannuna bhavitabbam.
mn69:12.2: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu jagariyam ananuyutto hoti, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:12.3: ‘Kim panimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena yo ayamayasma jagariyam ananuyutto’ti—
mn69:12.5: Tasma arannikena bhikkhuna jagariyam anuyuttena bhavitabbam.
mn69:13.2: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu kusito hoti, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:13.3: ‘Kim panimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena yo ayamayasma kusito’ti—
mn69:14.2: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu mutthassati hoti, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:14.3: ‘Kim panimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena yo ayamayasma mutthassati’ti—
mn69:15.2: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu asamahito hoti, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:15.3: ‘Kim panimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena yo ayamayasma asamahito’ti—
mn69:16.2: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu duppanno hoti, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:16.3: ‘Kim panimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena yo ayamayasma duppanno’ti—
mn69:17.1: Arannikenavuso, bhikkhuna abhidhamme abhivinaye yogo karaniyo.
mn69:17.2: Santavuso, arannikam bhikkhum abhidhamme abhivinaye panham pucchitaro.
mn69:17.3: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu abhidhamme abhivinaye panham puttho na sampayati, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:17.4: ‘Kim panimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena yo ayamayasma abhidhamme abhivinaye panham puttho na sampayati’ti—
mn69:17.6: Tasma arannikena bhikkhuna abhidhamme abhivinaye yogo karaniyo.
mn69:18.1: Arannikenavuso, bhikkhuna ye te santa vimokkha atikkamma rupe aruppa tattha yogo karaniyo.
mn69:18.2: Santavuso, arannikam bhikkhum ye te santa vimokkha atikkamma rupe aruppa tattha panham pucchitaro.
mn69:18.3: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu ye te santa vimokkha atikkamma rupe aruppa tattha panham puttho na sampayati, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:18.4: ‘Kim panimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena yo ayamayasma ye te santa vimokkha atikkamma rupe aruppa tattha panham puttho na sampayati’ti—
mn69:18.6: Tasma arannikena bhikkhuna ye te santa vimokkha atikkamma rupe aruppa tattha yogo karaniyo.
mn69:19.1: Arannikenavuso, bhikkhuna uttari manussadhamme yogo karaniyo.
mn69:19.2: Santavuso, arannikam bhikkhum uttari manussadhamme panham pucchitaro.
mn69:19.3: Sace, avuso, aranniko bhikkhu uttari manussadhamme panham puttho na sampayati, tassa bhavanti vattaro.
mn69:19.4: ‘Kim panimassayasmato arannikassa ekassaranne seriviharena yo ayamayasma yassatthaya pabbajito tamattham na janati’ti—
mn69:19.6: Tasma arannikena bhikkhuna uttari manussadhamme yogo karaniyo”ti.
mn69:19.7: Evam vutte, ayasma mahamoggallano ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
mn69:19.8: “arannikeneva nu kho, avuso sariputta, bhikkhuna ime dhamma samadaya vattitabba udahu gamantaviharinapi”ti?
mn69:19.9: “Arannikenapi kho, avuso moggallana, bhikkhuna ime dhamma samadaya vattitabba pageva gamantaviharina”ti.
